title: Microsoft cinemania '95 (PC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Appreciation
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - History
description: An excellent reference multi-media programme for cinema research purposes. It features film-clips, dialogue and stills from over one hundred films as well as a comprehensive listing of international cinema that can be accessed by title, director or actor. Film sources are from Pauline Kaels' "5000 Nights at the Movies" and from the books of Roger Ebert and Ephraim Katz. SYSTEM REQUIRMENTS: Multimedia PC or compatible with a 386SX or higher microprocessor; 2 Mb of RAM, 5 Mb of available hard-disk space; VGA or higher resolution monitor; MS DOS operating system version 3.1 or higher; Microsoft Windows operating system version 3.1 or later.
